name: RestConnector
description: Connector for polling a REST server for information

connectorConfigurationSchema.title: Connector Configuration Schema
connectorConfigurationSchema.description: The JSON schema for the connector additional configuration field

SomeConnectorConfiguration.description: Some configurable value that is relevant to the connector as a whole

SomeEndpointConfiguration.description: Some other configurable value that is relevant to the connector as a whole

datasetConfigurationSchema.title: Dataset Config Schema
datasetConfigurationSchema.description: The JSON schema for both the default dataset configuration field and all individual dataset-specific configuration fields

SamplingInterval.description: How frequently to sample each dataset by default (in milliseconds)

datasetDataPointConfigurationSchema.title: Datapoint Config Schema
datasetDataPointConfigurationSchema.description: The JSON schema for both the default datapoint configuration field and all individual datapoint-specific configuration fields

SamplingInterval.description: How frequently to sample each datapoint by default (in milliseconds)

eventConfigurationSchema.title: Event Config Schema
eventConfigurationSchema.description: The JSON schema for both the default event configuration field and all event-specific configuration fields

SomeEventsProperty.description: Some configuration that is relevant to events

eventDataPointConfigurationSchema.title: Event Datapoint Config Schema
eventDataPointConfigurationSchema.description: The JSON schema for both the default event datapoint configuration field and all event-specific datapoint configuration fields

SomeEventsProperty.description: Some configuration that is relevant to events

streamConfigurationSchema.title: Event Config Schema
streamConfigurationSchema.description: The JSON schema for both the default stream configuration field and all stream-specific configuration fields

SomeStreamProperty.description: Some configuration that is relevant to streams

managementGroupConfigurationSchema.title: Management Group Config Schema
managementGroupConfigurationSchema.description: The JSON schema for both the default management group configuration field and all management group-specific configuration fields

SomeStreamProperty.description: Some configuration that is relevant to streams

processControlConfigurationSchema.title: Process control Config Schema
processControlConfigurationSchema.description: The JSON schema for both the default process control configuration field and all process control-specific configuration fields

SomeProcessControlProperty.description: Some configuration that is relevant to process control
